```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
d1 <- read_csv("points_2018_2019.csv")
d2 <- read_csv("points_2019_2020.csv")
d3 <- read_csv("points_2020_2021.csv")
d4 <- read_csv("points_2021_2022.csv")


d1$season <- "2018_2019"
d2$season <- "2019_2020"
d3$season <- "2020_2021"
d4$season <- "2021_2022"

dat <- bind_rows(d1 |> arrange("Team"), 
                 d2 |> arrange("Team"),
                 d3 |> arrange("Team"),
                 d4 |> arrange("Team")) |> 
  select("Team", "Points", "season")


dat |> pivot_wider(names_from = season, values_from = Points)
```
